item.title: Script: openclaw.ai
item.description: The OpenClaw installer at openclaw.ai/install.sh is a 1407-line bash script that sets up the OpenClaw CLI tool on macOS and Linux (including WSL). It is invoked via curl -fsSL --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 https://openclaw.ai/install.sh | bash. The script installs prerequisites (Homebrew on macOS, Node.js 22+, Git), then installs OpenClaw either globally via npm or from a git checkout, configures PATH, and optionally runs onboarding and migration steps.
